text: The Gilbert Islands (;Reilly Ridgell. Pacific Nations and Territories: The Islands of Micronesia, Melanesia, and Polynesia. 3rd. Ed. Honolulu: Bess Press, 1995. p. 95. in the past Kingsmill or King's-Mill Islands) are a group of sixteen islands in the Pacific Ocean. It is the main group of islands in Kiribati. They were named after British Captain Thomas Gilbert. He sailed there in 1788. ==References== Category:Pacific islands Category:Islands of Kiribati
title: Gilbert Islands
